Package io.micronaut.jdbc

Interface BasicJdbcConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatasourceConfiguration, DatasourceConfiguration, DatasourceConfiguration, DatasourceConfiguration
public interface BasicJdbcConfiguration
A contract for data source configuration classes to implement that allows for the calculation of several properties based on other properties.
Since:
1.0
Author:
James Kleeh, graemerocher
